Name: Agriculture
Description: The science, art, and practice of cultivating plants and livestock.

Name: Sciences
Description: The systematic enterprise that builds and organizes knowledge in the form of testable explanations and predictions about the universe.

Name: Architecture
Description: The art and science of designing and constructing buildings.

Name: Business & Management
Description: The study of organizing, planning, and analyzing business activities and managing operations.

Name: Computer Science
Description: The study of computer systems, programming, and software development.

Name: Creative Art & Design
Description: The expression of ideas through visual arts and design.

Name: Mechanism & Technology
Description: The study of applied mechanics and technology in industrial processes.

Name: Public Health
Description: The science of protecting and improving the health of people and their communities.

Name: Humanities
Description: The study of human culture, such as literature, philosophy, and history.

Name: Law
Description: The system of rules created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior.

Name: Social Science & Media
Description: The study of society, communication, and media production.

Name: Tourism & Hotel
Description: The study of managing travel, hospitality, and accommodation services.
